comments.body: The property `QuotationLevel` is also mutated in `spliceContext` and `quoteContext`. This may cause accidental errors when used without care. Maybe remove  `spliceContext` and `quoteContext`, since they are not used.
We use those in `PCPCheckAndHeal` and `ReifyQuotes`. There we only need to track the level.
